alert.note: Alert for Sauk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 1:47AM CDT until July 14 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Sauk County in south central Wisconsin... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 147 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles east of Wonewoc to 11 miles northeast of Richland Center, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Reedsburg, Wisconsin Dells, and Lake Delton around 155 AM CDT. Baraboo and West Baraboo around 205 AM CDT. Lake Wisconsin around 215 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Ironton, Lime Ridge, North Freedom, Loganville, La Valle, Rock Springs, Devils Lake St Park, Merrimac, Hill Point, and Bluffview. People attending The Sauk County Fair should seek safe shelter immediately! This includes the following Locations Mirror Lake State Park and Kilbourn Dam. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
